body.name: Phone Mini Tripod, Ruittos Premium Flexible Mobile Phone Tripod Stand Compatible with iPhone Samsung Go Pro, Small Digital Camera, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 4 hrs 5 mins
features: Best Budget Friendly Flexible Tripod: You will fall in love with this mini tripod when you get it. This tripod is perfect for content creator, videography, selfie portrait…If your camera is lightweight, you can put it onto this tripod. Just try it.

Universal Compatible: This phone tripod features with 1/4 screw on the top, and once the ball removed from the joint, you will see adapter for Go Pro or sports camera. So you can mount different device onto it as long as it’s not heavy, like smartphone, actions camera, lightweight camera, webcam, projector….

Flexible and Durable: this small tripod is not tiny type, it’s about 12inch tall, you can use it as a short selfie stick, or hand grip, or wrap it on fence, sticks, bicycle handlebars….to take shot which angle is not possible when use normal tripod.

Durable and Portable: The tripod body is made of stainless steel, ABS and foam, which makes it’s durable, portable and lightweight. It’s easy to be carried along, stand by your side whenever you need it. Give it a shot.
Easily take out for phone / sports camera or compact digital camera for videograph, YouTube , Vlog, ...
Warranty: 6 Months. Always feel free to contact us for support if need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good but broke quite fast.
reviews.reviewText: It was perfect for what i needed but it broke shortly after i started using it, just normal usage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grab and Go Tripod
reviews.reviewText: A great mini grab and go trip. Fits easily in a backpack or purse. Good quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I have no major complaints about this tripod other than it's sturdiness. Once it's standing, it stands just fine, but trying to get the phone into the holder once it's been set up is a hassle. And if you're saying "Why don't you put in the phone in before setting up the tripod?" I hear you, and to that I say: That's even more of a hassle. But for the price?? Great product, 10 stars. I was expecting much worse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars keep this on hand for family gatherings - get everyone in the picture!
reviews.reviewText: I keep this at my parents' house, as we like to get pictures of everyone - especially the children - over the years. The pictures then go into the electronic picture frame and they really appreciate it.This tripod works well with any phone we've had, and it is so much better than trying to balance the phone on a chair or swapping someone out over multiple pictures.The unit is actually small enough that I just put it in the corner behind the TV so it's always handy. I just grab it, put the phone in the spring-loaded jaws, and put it on a stool or the counter to frame the picture. Using the timer on the phone I can then get in the picture as well. Family pictures are important!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stupid design decision leads to a big problem
reviews.reviewText: At first I thought this was fine for what I needed. Sometime later, I noticed the pins that hold the legs in, have nothing that keep the pins in. So eventually the pins will slide out. I noticed this when one of the legs fell out, and another leg was close to falling out because its pin was also missing. The 3rd leg would be next as the last pin left was on its way out. This is a really stupid design that means its not meant for long time use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not terribly impressive
reviews.reviewText: Screws have come out a couple of times and I’ve only used a handful of times so far. Overall a little wobbly under the weight of a cell phone and, it’s bigger than expected. Would’ve been nice if it was more compact.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it definitely makes my FaceTime calls to my cousin better
reviews.reviewText: Better you say? How is that?The answer: I don’t have to hold the phone, and I can take it and wrap it around something to hold the camera. wrapping around some thing in order to stabilize. The camera hasn’t been an issue. I haven’t had to use that little handy feature but if I ever do, it’s there. But as a typical tripod, it works perfectly and it’s small enough so I can use it and just prop it on my bed and talk away!.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Firm Grasp!
reviews.reviewText: This is a wonderful tripod device for my phone it’s very customizable in terms of what angles you would like, it’s great at grasping and grappling on two different services, like the chair or rail, and it’s very sturdy. It has a very firm feel to it and so I’m very happy with this product.
